message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product, which holds immense value to us at $1500000. Recognizing its significance to you, I propose a fair and advantageous deal. For a limited time, I am extending a special offer to purchase this product at $1200000. This represents a substantial saving for you while ensuring a reasonable return on investment for me. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
